SEARCH
Package model

Class Doctor

Object
User
Doctor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Doctor>, IUser
public class Doctor extends User implements Comparable<Doctor>
The Doctor class represents a doctor in the system. It is a User and contains doctor-specific information like the specialty and availability. It implements the Comparable interface to support sorting doctors by their ratings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String userId, String password, UserRole role, String name, boolean isMale, int age, String email, String specialty, int ratingCount, float rating)
      Constructs a new Doctor with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID for the doctor
      password - the password for the doctor
      role - the role of the doctor (DOCTOR)
      name - the name of the doctor
      isMale - the gender of the user, true for Male, false for Female
      age - the age of the user
      email - the email address of the user
      specialty - the specialty of the doctor
      ratingCount - the number of ratings received by the doctor
      rating - the average rating of the doctor
      See Also:
      • User

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Doctor o)
      Compares this doctor with another doctor based on their ratings.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Doctor>
      Parameters:
      o - the doctor to be compared
      Returns:
      -1, 0, or 1 if this doctor is rated higher, equal, or lower than the other doctor, respectively
